title: Week 8 Preview 2022
description:
Field Yates and Mike Clay preview everything you need to know for Week 8 including injury updates, QB’s to stream, stars you may need to bench, expectations for players in new roles and more! Plus, should you be adding Kadarius Toney to your roster?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Field Yates, Stephania Bell, Mike Clay, Daniel Dopp
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: Getting You Ready To Set Your Week 8 Lineup With Everything You Need To Know
